data.title: Test Site
description: Here is a site I started in AngularJS, this version is in ReactJS. I desided to see what React was all about so here is a site using it.
Currently this site is just reading a static JSON file. I will eventually make it more dynamic and get the data from a DB of some sort. All the blow items are just placeholder data.

data.title: Do you like this poll
description: I was playing with building out a polling system.

data.title: Loot Crate Unboxing 'Time'
description: Here I am unboxing the October 2015 Loot Crate. This month the theme is 'Time'. This box has some pretty cool stuff in it, the exclusive Funko Pop is really nice.

data.title: What to play next?
description: Here I am unboxing the November 2015 Loot Crate. This month the theme is 'Combat'. This box has some pretty cool stuff in it, the Vault Boy bobblehead is really nice.
